name: Under the Wakzoo
storyline: Once upon a time, a large meteorite fell from the sky. Emitting an evil energy, the meteorite slowly sank into the ground. The evil energy rose from underground and emitted a sinister aura. In order to save the world, you need to descend into the underground.
summary:
Under the Wakzoo is side view and Roguelite Shooter game. This game is a fan game by YouTuber Woowakgood.
You can obtain various items and guns. Fight monsters in the underground to obtain items and progress through stages by defeating bosses. Ultimately, you must defeat the final boss to save the world.
